snippet: The path to this moment on Syria has been more complicated than a single utterance about a red line.
abstract: White House Memo; Pres Obama's decision to seek Congressional approval for a military strike on Syria is marked by complicated path; Obama may need Congress to approve future military confrontations in Middle East, perhaps with Iran; he is also wary of British Parliament's decision to not support a military intervention, and of the political and legal justification for action.
lead_paragraph: The path to this moment on Syria has been more complicated than a single utterance about a red line.

headline.print_headline: President Pulls Lawmakers Into Box He Made
headline.main: President Pulls Lawmakers Into Box He Made
